column5: The Cabernet Suite consists of two bedrooms and two bathrooms. Overlooking the north vineyard is the Cabernet Franc bedroom and on the other end of the suite overlooking the south vineyard is the Cabernet Sauvignon bedroom.  The Cabernet Franc bedroom features a sleigh bed flanked by built in cabinetry, while the Cabernet Sauvignon bedroom features a comfortable murphy bed that can be tucked away inside the surrounding built-in cabinetry.
